#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
	int ct=0;
	char a[100],b[100],sum[107];
	cin>>a;
	getchar();
	//cout<<a;
	cin>>b;
	getchar();
	if(a[0]=='0'&&b[0]=='0')
	{
		break;
	}
	int l1=strlen(a);
	int l2=strlen(b);
	///////////////////////////////////
	for(int i=0;i<l1;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]=='1')
		a[i]=1;
		if(a[i]=='2')
		a[i]=2;
		if(a[i]=='3')
		a[i]=3;
		if(a[i]=='4')
		a[i]=4;
		if(a[i]=='5')
		a[i]=5;
		if(a[i]=='6')
		a[i]=6;
		if(a[i]=='7')
		a[i]=7;
		if(a[i]=='8')
		a[i]=8;
		if(a[i]=='9')
		a[i]=9;
		if(a[i]=='0')
		a[i]=0;	
	}
	for(int i=0;i<l2;i++)
	{
		if(b[i]=='1')
		b[i]=1;
		if(b[i]=='2')
		b[i]=2;
		if(b[i]=='3')
		b[i]=3;
		if(b[i]=='4')
		b[i]=4;
		if(b[i]=='5')
		b[i]=5;
		if(b[i]=='6')
		b[i]=6;
		if(b[i]=='7')
		b[i]=7;
		if(b[i]=='8')
		b[i]=8;
		if(b[i]=='9')
		b[i]=9;
		if(b[i]=='0')
		b[i]=0;	
	}
	///////////////////////
	int k=0,carry=0;
	if(l1==l2)
	{
		for(int i=l1-1;i>0;i--)
		{
			sum[k]=a[i]+b[i]+carry;
			if(sum[k]>9)
			{
				ct++;
				sum[k]=sum[k]%10;
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			carry=0;
			k++;
		}
		sum[k]=a[0]+b[0]+carry;
		if(sum[k]>9)
		{
			ct++;
		}
	}
	else if(l1>l2)
	{
		int q=l1-1;
		int w=l2-1;
		for(int i=0;i<l2;i++)
		{
			sum[k]=a[q]+b[w]+carry;
			if(sum[k]>9)
			{
				ct++;
				sum[k]=sum[k]%10;
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			carry=0;
			k++;
			q--;
			w--;
		}
		for(int i=q;i>0;i--)
		{
			sum[k]=a[i]+carry;
			if(sum[k]>9)
			{
				ct++;
				sum[k]=sum[k]%10;
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			carry=0;
			k++;
		}
		sum[k]=a[0]+carry;
		if(sum[k]>9)
		{
			ct++;
		}
	}
	else if(l2>l1)
	{
		int q=l1-1;
		int w=l2-1;
		//printf("%d %d\n",q,w);
		for(int i=0;i<l1;i++)
		{
			sum[k]=a[q]+b[w]+carry;
			if(sum[k]>9)
			{
				ct++;
				sum[k]=sum[k]%10;
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			carry=0;
			k++;
			q--;
			w--;
		}
		for(int i=w;i>0;i--)
		{
			sum[k]=b[i]+carry;
			if(sum[k]>9)
			{
				ct++;
				sum[k]=sum[k]%10;
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			carry=0;
			k++;
		}
		sum[k]=b[0]+carry;
		if(sum[k]>9)
		{
			ct++;
		}
	}
//	for(int i=k;i>=0;i--)
//	printf("%d",sum[i]);
//	printf("\n");
	if(ct==0)
	printf("No carry operation.\n");
	if(ct==1)
	printf("1 carry operation.\n");
	else if(ct!=0&&ct!=1)
	printf("%d carry operations.\n",ct);
}
	return 0;
}
